update.name: Hutkigrosh for Joomshopping
update.description: Hutkigrosh™ — payment service for invoicing to AIS *Raschet* (ERIP Belarus). After invoicing you will be available for payment by a plastic card and electronic money, at any of the bank branches, cash desks, ATMs, payment terminals, in the electronic money system, through Internet banking, M-banking, Internet acquiring
